tools.name: create_document
tools.description:
Creates a new, empty Word document with specified metadata and saves it.

    Args:
        filename (str): The name of the file to create (e.g., 'report.docx').
        author (str, optional): The author of the document. Defaults to None.
        title (str, optional): The title of the document. Defaults to None.
        subject (str, optional): The subject of the document. Defaults to None.
        keywords (str, optional): Comma-separated keywords for the document. Defaults to None.

    Returns:
        str: A JSON string confirming the successful creation, e.g.,
             '{"status": "success", "file_path": "report.docx"}'.

    Example:
        create_document(filename='new_report.docx', author='John Doe', title='Annual Report')

tools.name: get_document_text
tools.description:
Extracts and returns all the text content from an existing Word document.

    Args:
        filename (str): The path to the Word document.

    Returns:
        str: The full text content of the document.

    Example:
        get_document_text(filename='existing_report.docx')

tools.name: add_paragraph
tools.description:
Adds a new paragraph of text to the end of a specified document.

    Args:
        filename (str): The path to the Word document.
        text (str): The text content to add in the paragraph.
        style (str, optional): The name of the style to apply (e.g., 'Normal'). Defaults to None.

    Returns:
        str: A JSON string confirming the operation.

    Example:
        add_paragraph(filename='report.docx', text='This is a new paragraph.')

tools.name: add_heading
tools.description:
Adds a heading to the document.

    Args:
        filename (str): The path to the Word document.
        text (str): The text of the heading.
        level (int): The heading level, from 0 (Title) to 9.

    Returns:
        str: A JSON string confirming the operation.

    Example:
        add_heading(filename='report.docx', text='Chapter 1', level=1)

tools.name: create_custom_style
tools.description:
Creates a new custom paragraph style.

    Args:
        filename (str): Path to the Word document.
        style_name (str): Name for the new custom style.
        font_name (str, optional): Font for the style (e.g., 'Calibri').
        font_size_pt (int, optional): Font size in points.
        bold (bool, optional): Whether the font should be bold.
        italic (bool, optional): Whether the font should be italic.
        underline (bool, optional): Whether the font should be underlined.

    Returns:
        str: A JSON string confirming style creation.

    Example:
        create_custom_style(filename='report.docx', style_name='CustomBody', font_name='Arial', font_size_pt=12)

tools.name: format_text
tools.description:
Searches for text and applies formatting to all instances found.

    Args:
        filename (str): Path to the Word document.
        search_text (str): The text to find and format.
        bold (bool, optional): Apply bold formatting.
        italic (bool, optional): Apply italic formatting.
        underline (bool, optional): Apply underline formatting.

    Returns:
        str: JSON string reporting the number of instances formatted.

    Example:
        format_text(filename='report.docx', search_text='important', bold=True)

tools.name: protect_document
tools.description:
Sets write-protection for a document. Not supported by python-docx.

    Args:
        filename (str): Path to the Word document.
        password (str): The password for protection.

    Returns:
        str: A JSON string indicating the feature is not supported.

    Example:
        protect_document(filename='report.docx', password='123')

tools.name: add_footnote_to_document
tools.description:
Adds a footnote to the end of the last paragraph.

    Args:
        filename (str): Path to the Word document.
        footnote_text (str): The text content of the footnote.

    Returns:
        str: A JSON string confirming the operation.

    Example:
        add_footnote_to_document(filename='report.docx', footnote_text='Source: Annual Report')

tools.name: get_paragraph_text_from_document
tools.description:
Retrieves the text from a single paragraph by its index.

    Args:
        filename (str): The path to the Word document.
        paragraph_index (int): The zero-based index of the paragraph.

    Returns:
        str: The text content of the specified paragraph.

    Example:
        get_paragraph_text_from_document(filename='report.docx', paragraph_index=0)

tools.name: find_text_in_document
tools.description:
Searches for text and returns the content of all paragraphs containing it.

    Args:
        filename (str): The path to the Word document.
        search_text (str): The text to search for.

    Returns:
        str: A JSON string containing a list of paragraph texts.

    Example:
        find_text_in_document(filename='report.docx', search_text='budget')

tools.name: add_table
tools.description:
Adds a table with a specified number of rows and columns.

    Args:
        filename (str): Path to the Word document.
        rows (int): The number of rows in the table.
        cols (int): The number of columns in the table.
        style (str, optional): Style for the table (e.g., 'Light Shading Accent 1').

    Returns:
        str: A JSON string confirming the operation.

    Example:
        add_table(filename='report.docx', rows=3, cols=4)

tools.name: add_picture
tools.description:
Adds a picture from a local path to the document.

    Args:
        filename (str): Path to the Word document.
        picture_path (str): File path of the image to be added.
        width_cm (float, optional): Width of the picture in centimeters.

    Returns:
        str: A JSON string confirming the operation.

    Example:
        add_picture(filename='report.docx', picture_path='logo.png', width_cm=5)

tools.name: add_page_break
tools.description:
Adds a manual page break to the end of the document.

    Args:
        filename (str): The path to the Word document.

    Returns:
        str: A JSON string confirming the operation.

    Example:
        add_page_break(filename='report.docx')

tools.name: add_header
tools.description:
Adds or replaces the document's primary header.

    Args:
        filename (str): The path to the Word document.
        text (str): The text to place in the header.

    Returns:
        str: A JSON string confirming the operation.

    Example:
        add_header(filename='report.docx', text='Company Confidential')

tools.name: add_footer
tools.description:
Adds or replaces the document's primary footer.

    Args:
        filename (str): The path to the Word document.
        text (str): The text to place in the footer.

    Returns:
        str: A JSON string confirming the operation.

    Example:
        add_footer(filename='report.docx', text='Page 1')

tools.name: convert_to_pdf
tools.description:
Converts a Word document to PDF format.

    Args:
        filename (str): Path to the source Word document.
        output_filename (str, optional): Path for the output PDF file.
                                        Defaults to the same name with a .pdf extension.

    Returns:
        str: A JSON string confirming the conversion and providing the PDF path.

    Example:
        convert_to_pdf(filename='report.docx', output_filename='report.pdf')

find_text_in_document.case_name: Search Text in Valid Document with Match
find_text_in_document.purpose: 验证在包含搜索文本的文档中是否能正确返回匹配段落
验证在空文档中搜索时是否返回空结果而不报错

find_text_in_document.case_name: Search Text in Document without Match
find_text_in_document.purpose: 验证在不包含搜索文本的文档中是否返回空列表

find_text_in_document.case_name: Search with Special Characters in Text
find_text_in_document.purpose: 验证工具能否处理包含特殊字符的搜索文本
验证尝试搜索不存在的文件时是否能优雅地处理错误

find_text_in_document.case_name: Attempt Search Using Malicious File Path
find_text_in_document.purpose: 验证对潜在恶意路径（如试图读取上级目录）是否能安全拒绝访问

response.result: {"status": "error", "message": "Invalid file path. Path traversal is not allowed."}

add_table.case_name: Add Table with Minimal Required Parameters
add_table.purpose: 验证在指定文件中添加具有默认样式的表格是否成功，使用最小必要参数（rows和cols）
验证可以为新增的表格应用自定义样式（如 'Light Shading Accent 1'）
验证尝试向一个不存在的Word文档中添加表格时是否返回明确错误信息
验证当rows参数为0时工具是否能正确处理边界值并返回错误信息
验证当cols参数为0时工具是否能正确处理边界值并返回错误信息

add_table.case_name: Add Table with Negative Rows and Columns
add_table.purpose: 验证当rows和cols为负数时工具是否能优雅地处理非法输入

add_table.case_name: Add Table to Read-Only File Path
add_table.purpose: 验证尝试将表格写入到不可写的目录或文件时是否能正确报告错误

add_table.case_name: Add Table Using Malicious File Path
add_table.purpose: 验证对潜在恶意路径（如试图写入上级目录）是否能安全拒绝操作

response.result: {"status": "error", "message": "Invalid file path. Path traversal is not allowed."}

add_picture.purpose: 验证使用必填参数filename和picture_path时，图片能否成功添加到文档中
验证提供可选width_cm参数时，图片是否以指定宽度插入
验证尝试向不存在的Word文档中添加图片时是否能返回明确错误信息
验证尝试添加非图像文件作为图片时工具是否能正确拒绝
验证当提供负数width_cm值时是否能进行有效参数校验

response.result: {"status": "error", "message": "value must be in range 0 to 27273042316900 inclusive, got -1080000"}

add_picture.purpose: 验证对潜在恶意路径（如试图读取上级目录）添加图片时是否能安全拒绝访问

response.result: {"status": "error", "message": "Invalid file path. Path traversal is not allowed."}

add_picture.purpose: 验证向文档中添加大尺寸图片时是否能正常处理

add_picture.case_name: Add Picture with Special Characters in Path
add_picture.purpose: 验证包含特殊字符的图片路径是否可以被正确处理

add_page_break.case_name: Add Page Break to Valid Document
add_page_break.purpose: 验证向一个有效的Word文档末尾添加手动分页符是否成功

add_page_break.case_name: Add Page Break to Empty Document
add_page_break.purpose: 验证向一个空的Word文档末尾添加手动分页符是否成功且不报错

add_page_break.case_name: Attempt to Add Page Break to Non-Existent File
add_page_break.purpose: 验证尝试向不存在的文件添加分页符时是否能优雅地处理错误

add_page_break.case_name: Add Page Break with Malicious File Path
add_page_break.purpose: 验证对潜在恶意路径（如试图写入上级目录）是否能安全拒绝访问

response.result: {"status": "error", "message": "Invalid file path. Path traversal is not allowed."}

add_page_break.case_name: Add Page Break to File in Non-Writable Directory
add_page_break.purpose: 验证目标目录不可写时是否能优雅地处理错误而不崩溃

add_page_break.case_name: Add Page Break Using Long File Path
add_page_break.purpose: 验证系统能否处理长文件路径下的Word文档并正确添加分页符

add_page_break.case_name: Add Page Break to File with Special Characters in Path
add_page_break.purpose: 验证包含特殊字符的文件路径是否可以被正确处理

add_page_break.case_name: Attempt to Add Page Break Without Providing Filename
add_page_break.purpose: 验证未提供filename参数时是否返回明确的错误信息

response.error:

filename
  Field required [type=missing, input_value={}, input_type=dict]
    For further information visit https://errors.pydantic.dev/2.10/v/missing

add_header.case_name: Add Header to Valid Word Document
add_header.purpose: 验证向一个有效的Word文档中添加指定文本的header是否成功

add_header.case_name: Replace Existing Header in Word Document
add_header.purpose: 验证当文档已有header时，能否正确替换为新文本

add_header.case_name: Add Empty Header to Word Document
add_header.purpose: 验证添加空字符串作为header时是否能正常处理（清空header）

add_header.case_name: Add Special Characters in Header Text
add_header.purpose: 验证header文本包含特殊字符和Unicode时是否能被正确写入

add_header.case_name: Attempt Add Header to Non-Existent File
add_header.purpose: 验证尝试向不存在的文件添加header时是否返回明确错误信息

add_header.case_name: Attempt Add Header Using Malicious File Path
add_header.purpose: 验证对潜在恶意路径（如试图修改上级目录中的文件）是否能安全拒绝操作

response.result: {"status": "error", "message": "Invalid file path. Path traversal is not allowed."}

add_header.purpose: 验证添加超长header文本时是否能正常处理而不截断或报错

args.text: This is a very long header text that exceeds normal length limits and is used to test the maximum allowed size for a document's header. It should be fully preserved without truncation or error.

add_header.case_name: Add Header to Invalid File Type
add_header.purpose: 验证尝试向非Word文档（如TXT）添加header时是否返回明确错误信息

add_footer.purpose: 验证向一个有效的Word文档添加页脚是否成功
验证替换已有页脚内容是否能正确更新
验证添加空字符串作为页脚时，是否清除现有页脚或创建空白页脚

add_footer.case_name: Attempt Add Footer to Non-Existent File
add_footer.purpose: 验证尝试向不存在的文件添加页脚时是否返回明确错误信息
验证包含特殊字符和Unicode的页脚文本能否被正确添加
验证对只读Word文档添加页脚时是否能优雅处理错误
验证添加超长页脚文本时是否能正常处理

args.text: This is a very long footer text that exceeds the normal page footer space and may require wrapping or truncation depending on document settings. This is only for testing purposes.

add_footer.case_name: Add Footer Using Malicious File Path
add_footer.purpose: 验证潜在恶意路径（如试图访问上级目录）是否能被安全拒绝

response.result: {"status": "error", "message": "Invalid file path. Path traversal is not allowed."}

convert_to_pdf.case_name: Convert Word to PDF with Default Output Filename
convert_to_pdf.purpose: 验证在仅提供必填参数filename时是否能成功将Word文档转换为PDF，并使用默认的输出文件名

convert_to_pdf.case_name: Convert Word to PDF with Custom Output Filename
convert_to_pdf.purpose: 验证提供自定义output_filename参数时，是否能正确将Word文档转换为指定路径和文件名的PDF

convert_to_pdf.case_name: Convert Empty Word Document to PDF
convert_to_pdf.purpose: 验证空的Word文档是否可以成功转换为PDF而不引发错误

convert_to_pdf.case_name: Convert Word with Special Characters in Filename to PDF
convert_to_pdf.purpose: 验证包含特殊字符的源文件名能否被正确处理并成功转换为PDF

convert_to_pdf.case_name: Convert Word from Long File Path to PDF
convert_to_pdf.purpose: 验证系统能否处理长文件路径下的Word文档转换为PDF

convert_to_pdf.case_name: Attempt to Convert Non-Existent Word File to PDF
convert_to_pdf.purpose: 验证尝试转换不存在的Word文件时是否返回明确的错误信息

convert_to_pdf.case_name: Attempt to Convert Invalid File Type to PDF
convert_to_pdf.purpose: 验证尝试转换非.docx扩展名的文件（如.txt）是否会失败并返回清晰的错误信息

convert_to_pdf.case_name: Attempt to Convert Using Malicious File Path
convert_to_pdf.purpose: 验证对潜在恶意路径（如试图读取上级目录）进行转换操作时是否能安全拒绝访问

response.result: {"status": "error", "message": "Invalid file path. Path traversal is not allowed."}
